it.escape.tools

Class GlobalSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.escape.tools.GlobalSettings

  • public class GlobalSettings
extends java.lang.Object
    Class which holds *some* global options. The intention is to hold all the options which can be set via cli parameters, and make them accessible everywhere else in the program. When the program branches, a reference to this class must be propagated to the various sub-branches.
    Author:
    michele
